text: The Heart of Jennifer is a 1915 American silent drama movie directed by James Kirkwood, Sr. (who also stars) and also starring Hazel Dawn, Russell Bassett, Harry C. Browne. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * * Category:1915 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Heart of Jennifer
